extendedInfo.description: Take a thrilling ride through the city that never sleeps with 3D Rollercoaster Rush NY!With the revolutionary AllJoynÂ© innovation, you can now play your favorite Rollercoaster competing against your friends!Play 40 action-packed New York City 3D rollercoaster tracks full of steep, sky-scraping peaks, huge drops and gut-wrenching curves! Pull off Extreme Air, Crushing Gâs and other insane stunts as you overcome challenging breakable tracks, loop-the-loops, chasm jumps and more! Speed increases your excitement meter, multiplying your score, but even small jolts are enough to send carts hurtling down to the streets below!FULL VERSION FEATURES:AllJoyn enabled Multiplayer mode! Experience 40 ALL NEW Career tracks + 40 ALL NEW Challenge races with over 100 crazy loop-the-loops, jumps and tunnels in a stunning New York City setting!New, unlimited ways to crash your cart â including terrifying breakable tracks!Face friends head-to-head in real time with AllJoyn  multiplayer mode!Career Mode â Keep your carts intact through huge loop the loops, chasm jumps and more!Challenge Races â race for the best time without flying off the tracks!Score big with insane stunts like â Extreme Air, Crushing Gâs and more!Expertly crafted tracks with realistic coaster physicsFun and easy Touch controls*Â© AllJoyn and its copyright is an open-source, radio-agnostic application development framework, developed by Qualcomm Innovation Center, Inc., a wholly owned subsidiary of Qualcomm IncorporatedKeywords:AllJoynRollRollerRollercoasterNew YorkNYtunnelcareerMapMultiplayerCoopCo-opBoard gameDigital Chocolatedchoc

reviews.title: BEST GAME EVER!... G2X
reviews.comment: I have played about everything and this game is just awesome I wish more games had this much re-playability, the most addictive game I have played, great job on the game guys keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had this game on my presmart phone...
reviews.comment: Awesome work on keeping the charm of the 2D game. Love those falling tracks.   ! Please make the font for directions resizable, can not read directions on Samsung Galaxy 3.  And can not read text between races or rides. !
reviews.author: Jon Abilitv

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This game is terrible as the graphics and speed of the game dont even WORK correctly on my phone. I am very disappointed with this game and will be uninstalling it very soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Im enjoying it
reviews.comment: Im surprised this game is doing so badly in the charts, its simple fun and cheap. Also you soon find the levels get hard enough to hold your interest. would be five star but it send app not responding msg two or three times after exit, quite annoying .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not compatible
reviews.comment: The game is a rip off u pay for it and can\'t install it. Complete bullshit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: God, but
reviews.comment: Its a good game for 99 cents. On the iTunes market, there are about 20 different types and all but one are free. Please add these to android!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps force closing
reviews.comment: Was a great turn over from ios. But since last update, it keeps force closing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was my favorite.
reviews.comment: Loved this game on my iPod and BlackBerry. Was super excited to get it on my android, but the fun is gone. No tilt controls! Game just seems boring without. Would be great 5 starts if updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I wanna refund!
reviews.comment: Worst game ever! Played 3 tracks n fuc*kin crash Everytime! I give up, gimme my money back!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor graphics
reviews.comment: I bought this game for rs 55.. not worth it. Too poor graphics, doesn\'t fit galaxy tab resolution (too low).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: I really love how the view will switch around while going on the track. A+ for that one and not being able to see down the track.
reviews.author: Jason Ballard

reviews.title: *Question 4 the game designer*
reviews.comment: I have the HTC EVO 4G LTE from sprint. The map does not fit my screen why is this? Worked just fine on my older HTC EVO. How do I fix this or maybe u need to please. I really love this game as does my 4 yr old. He is dissapointed he cannot play it. + I payed 4 it. *A response would be most appreciated*
reviews.author: erica Dulaney

reviews.title: Rolicostder
reviews.comment: I love it is so fun!

reviews.comment: Very awesome game.....wow fantastic baby...muacksss

reviews.title: Htc evo 4g lte
reviews.comment: Does not work, game is not set up for resolution on phone, please update

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good but a think there could be a few more features like tilt control etc but overall i love this game! I would like it if you could make a few more themes and features.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Graphics and constantly freezes..not happy
